subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Giambi’s pinch-hit single moved Melky Cabrera from first to third in the bottom of the ninth inning and Derek Jeter’s chopper off the pitcher’s glove drove in the winning run.
snippet: Jason Giambi’s pinch-hit single moved Melky Cabrera from first to third in the bottom of the ninth inning and Derek Jeter’s chopper off the pitcher’s glove drove in the winning run.
